info.name: Better Plex
info.description:
Features:

- Full Redesign in white theme (can be disabled)
- Beautiful Drop Shadows
- Recolor all orange accents into your desired colors
- Smooth transitions/animations
- A lot of customizations to choose from*

* Still under development, some customizations might not work correctly or not at all
info.additionalInfo:
2019-04-20
Fixed white theme not working properly for app.plex.tv
